localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Getting a journalist to talk about your startup is not easy, but our platform makes it simple. Pressful connects startups with professional journalists, who will conduct a 5 minute video interview & blast it off 🚀 to major news outlets.
blogPost.body: Getting a journalist to talk about your startup is not easy, but our platform makes it simple. Pressful connects startups with professional journalists, who will conduct a 5 minute video interview & blast it off 🚀 to major news outlets.
blogPost.title: Pressful - Get instant access to journalists who will interview you
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 让记者谈论你的创业并不容易，但我们的平台让这件事变得简单了。Pressful将初创公司与专业记者联系起来，他们将进行5分钟的视频采访，并通过🚀向主要新闻机构发布。
localize.tagline: 即时联系将采访您的记者

localize.description: 讓記者談論你的創業並不容易，但我們的平臺讓這件事變得簡單了。Pressful將初創公司與專業記者聯繫起來，他們將進行5分鐘的視頻採訪，並通過🚀向主要新聞機構發佈。
localize.tagline: 即時聯繫將採訪您的記者

previous.excerpt: - Auto-resize your designs using our AI engine - Apply your brand kit across draft and finished designs - Choose from millions of images, graphics, and fonts - Thousands of curated templates for all your business needs - User-friendly drag-and-drop editor
previous.title: Designmaker | Designs.ai - Get quick, quality designs with smart templates

localize.description: - 使用我们的AI引擎自动调整您的设计大小 - 在草稿和成品设计中应用您的品牌套件 - 从数百万张图像、图形和字体中选择 - 为您的所有业务需求精心设计的数千个模板 - 用户友好的拖放编辑器
localize.tagline: 使用智能模板快速获得优质设计

localize.description: - 使用我們的AI引擎自動調整您的設計大小 - 在草稿和成品設計中應用您的品牌套件 - 從數百萬張圖像、圖形和字體中選擇 - 爲您的所有業務需求精心設計的數千個模板 - 用戶友好的拖放編輯器
localize.tagline: 使用智能模板快速獲得優質設計

next.excerpt: Kaleidoscope 2.4 features a new powerful integration with the Xcode debugger. Send any debugger command (ksp) or object (kspo) output to Kaleidoscope. This enables iterating over common development tasks quickly.
next.title: Kaleidoscope 2.4 - Compare debug output. Now with Xcode integration

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特点是与Xcode调试器进行了新的强大集成。将任何调试器命令（ksp）或对象（kspo）输出发送到Kaleidoscope。这使其能够快速迭代常见的开发任务。
localize.tagline: 比较调试输出。现在与Xcode集成

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特點是與Xcode調試器進行了新的強大集成。將任何調試器命令（ksp）或對象（kspo）輸出發送到Kaleidoscope。這使其能夠快速迭代常見的開發任務。
localize.tagline: 比較調試輸出。現在與Xcode集成
